梖字的基本解释

梖
bèi
〔梖多〕即贝叶树，常绿乔木，叶子用水沤后可以代纸，古代印度人多用以写佛经。

梖字的汉语字典释义

[①]［bèi］
［《集韻》博蓋切，去夳，幫。］
见“梖多”。

梖字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　梖； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页529第03
【集韻】【類篇】?博蓋切，音貝。【酉陽雜俎】梖多木，出摩伽佗國，長六七丈，經冬不彫，取其皮書之。本作貝。俗作梖。【廣州記】嵩寺忽有思惟樹，卽貝多也。有人坐貝多樹下思惟，因以名焉。【寰宇志】緬甸在滇南，有樹頭椶，高五六尺，結實如㭨子，卽貝樹也，偭人取其葉寫書。【唐·張喬·貝多樹詩】還應毫末長，始見拂丹霄。得子從西國，成隂見昔朝。餘詳貝字註。

梖字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
梖字的起名意思

梖多，即贝叶树，常绿乔木，叶子用水沤后可以代纸，古代印度人多用以写佛经。

Mou
Basic explanation of words
Mou
bèi
[梖多] refers to bay leaf trees, evergreen trees, and the leaves can be used to replace paper after retting with water. Ancient Indians mostly used them to write Buddhist scriptures.
Mou
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［bèi］
["Jiyun" Bogeqie, Quqiu, help. ]
See "梖多".
Mou
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　梖; Kangxi Strokes: 11; Page Number: Page 529 03
[Ji Yun] [Class Chapter]? Bogeche, Yinbei. 【Youyang Miscellaneous】Zhe Duomu, born in the country of Magaduo, is six or seven zhang long, and will not be carved in winter, whichever is from the book. This is a shellfish. Vulgar. [Guangzhou] Suddenly there is a tree of thought in Song Temple, and there is also more than one bed. Some people sit under the Bedo tree and think because of the name. 【Universal History】Myanmar is in southern Yunnan. There are tree heads, five or six feet high, and strong like a child. The shells are also trees, and a few people take the leaves and write books. 【Tang·Zhang Qiao·Beduoshu Poems】Should be barely long before seeing Fudanxiao. You have a son from the West, and you can see the past when you become a yin. Yu Xiangbei word note.

Name meaning
Many, namely bay-leaf trees, evergreen trees, the leaves can be used to replace paper after retting with water, and ancient Indians mostly used them to write Buddhist scriptures.
